╔══✪〘 *Feature List* 〙✪══
╠➥ !ping
╠═➥ To check if bot is active.
║
╠➥ !help / !menu
╠═➥ To show this menu.
║
╠➥ !start
╠═➥ To start inputting.
║
╠➥ !finish
╠═➥ To end inputting.
║
╠➥ !download
╠═➥ To download Excel.
║
╠➥ !reset
╠═➥ To reset Excel.
╚══〘 *AsyaryGig's Bot* 〙

╔══✪〘 *Input Command* 〙✪══
╠➥ Add <label> <value> <*desc>
╠═➥ To add or replace a label.
║
╠➥ Remove <label>
╠═➥ To remove a label.
║
╠➥ dd/mm/yy
╠═➥ To change input's date.
║
╠➥ Reset
╠═➥ To reset current input.
║
╠➥ Cancel
╠═➥ To cancel input process.
╚══〘 *AsyaryGig's Bot* 〙

*Note: input command only affects the current input, not the Excel.
**Description is optional.
